archimate:DataObject.name: Entity
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
An Entity models an individual thing. Each Entity has a unique identity in that you can distinguish its individuality from among all other Entities of the same or a different type.
The Information provided by the Aggregates is structured in Entities. For example, the "Customer" aggregate can provide Customer Credit Rating information of the customer, or the customer positions. "Customer Credit Rating" or "Customer contact Points" are examples of entities belonging to the "Customer" Aggregate
